address: Xã Mỹ Hòa, Huyện Ba Tri, Tỉnh Bến Tre
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Reorganization for the Given Address**

Okay, so the user wants the new ward for "Xã Mỹ Hòa, Huyện Ba Tri, Tỉnh Bến Tre." My thought process starts with recognizing this is a matter of administrative restructuring and will require consulting the relevant legal documents.  First, the old province "Tỉnh Bến Tre" needs to be verified. I'll need to check the comprehensive province merger and adjustment resolutions, starting with the prominent 60-NQ/TW to see if "Tỉnh Bến Tre" has been merged or retained.  

Based on my understanding, that resolution indeed states that Bến Tre was merged with Vĩnh Long and Trà Vinh, forming "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long." This means the new province is Vĩnh Long. Then I'll have to investigate other relevant administrative resolutions.

My focus now shifts to finding the specific adjustments concerning "Mỹ Hòa" within the context of the Ba Tri district. I will need to search through "Other resolutions" focusing on any references to both "Mỹ Hòa" and either "Bến Tre" or "Vĩnh Long" now that I know the original province was merged.

I found the crucial resolution: 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning Vĩnh Long. It should contain a section about the district "Ba Tri." Scanning through it, I found several relevant lines. Line 45 described a "Mỹ Hòa" in "huyện Cầu Ngang" which is in Trà Vinh or Vĩnh Long, not Bến Tre, so this is unrelated.

Line 83 mentions "Ba Tri" and is relevant. However, line 85 caught my attention. It states: "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số củaxã Mỹ Hòa và xã Mỹ Chánh (huyện Ba Tri), xã Mỹ Nhơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa**." Bingo! This is the direct match I was looking for. This line precisely addresses "Xã Mỹ Hòa, Huyện Ba Tri" by grouping it with Mỹ Chánh and Mỹ Nhơn to form the new ward "Mỹ Chánh Hòa." The other lines (Line 86 and 108) are not relevant here since those do not reference Mỹ Hòa.

With this solid reference, I can confidently state that the old "Xã Mỹ Hòa, Huyện Ba Tri" is now part of the newly formed "Xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa." The relevant citation is line 85 of 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15. I'm highly confident in this finding because it's a direct match. The province is, of course, "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long," as confirmed earlier. I will now look up "Xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa" in the ward list to obtain its code and confirm the province. The ward "Xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa" has the code "29122."

This results in a JSON output with the following data:

*   Citation: 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 85
*   Confidence: High
*   Province name: Tỉnh Vĩnh Long
*   Ward code: 29122
*   Ward name: Xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa

citation.header: 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Vĩnh Long
citation.line: 85. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số củaxã Mỹ Hòa và xã Mỹ Chánh (huyện Ba Tri), xã Mỹ Nhơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Mỹ Chánh Hòa**.
